amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would increase taxes on taxpayers whose annual income is below $250,000.

action.text: Amendment SA 1228 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 1228 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 231.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1228.

Amendment SA 1228 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6615-6616, S6619-6620; text: CR S6616) To create a point of order against legislation that would increase taxes on taxpayers whose annual income is below $250,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 1228 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 231.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1228 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 1116.
